adm:managed-object.name: crypto-manager
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
provides hashing, encryption and other kinds of cryptographic operations. It also contains methods for compressing and decompressing data.

adm:property.name: digest-algorithm
adm:property.adm:synopsis: The preferred message digest algorithm for the Directory Server.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property will take effect immediately but will only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: mac-algorithm
adm:property.adm:synopsis: The preferred MAC algorithm for the Directory Server.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property will take effect immediately but will only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: mac-key-length
adm:property.adm:synopsis: The preferred key length in bits for the preferred MAC algorithm.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property will take effect immediately but will only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: cipher-transformation
adm:property.adm:synopsis: The preferred cipher for the Directory Server.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property will take effect immediately but will only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: cipher-key-length
adm:property.adm:synopsis: The preferred key length in bits for the preferred cipher.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property will take effect immediately but will only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: key-wrapping-transformation
adm:property.adm:synopsis: The preferred key wrapping transformation for the Directory Server.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property will take effect immediately but will only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: ssl-protocol
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the names of the SSL protocols that will be allowed for use in SSL or TLS communication.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property will take effect immediately but will only impact new SSL/TLS-based sessions created after the change.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: Uses the default set of SSL protocols provided by the server's JVM.

adm:property.name: ssl-cipher-suite
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the names of the SSL cipher suites that will be allowed for use in SSL or TLS communication.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property will take effect immediately but will only impact new SSL/TLS-based sessions created after the change.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: Uses the default set of SSL cipher suites provided by the server's JVM.

adm:property.name: ssl-encryption
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies whether SSL/TLS is used to provide encrypted communication between two OpenDS server components.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property will take effect immediately but will only impact new SSL/TLS-based sessions created after the change.
